segments.text: I see the angled view of this busy kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands facing left, drying her plate absorbedly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But behind her, the faucet's causing a real problem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water overflows the sink in a steady sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's dripping onto the cabinets and forming a slick puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's in it up to her ankle, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's climbing the stool toward the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand's in the cookie jar, the other on a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is splayed and about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands attentively, palm up for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a lovely garden view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and a path look so orderly out there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's shocking how the inside is on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
